_source.text: ACS took all our troubles and worries away, from speaking to Daniel for the first time he was very understanding and put our minds to rest, the service is absolutely everything they promise, in fact it is better than promised it delivered and swiftly brought to a conclusion very swiftly.

text: it **is** **better** **than** promised it delivered and swiftly brought to a conclusion very swiftly.

understanding and put our minds to rest, the service is absolutely everything they **promise**, in fact

_source.text: Actually, the situation is worse than Paul describes, at least with some of the clients I deal with at the moment: we have got to the point now where not only is it understood that if you don't sign away publishing you won't get the job, also the fees for composition and production are reduced, sometimes to zero!, with the argument that "the composer will earn enough royalties"!

at the moment: we have got to the point now where not only is it understood that if you **don't** sign
**away** publishing you won't get the job, also the fees for composition and production are reduced
, sometimes to **zero**!, with the argument that "the composer will earn enough royalties"!

_source.text: After downloading Doom Builder (which is better than ever, BTW), I found out that mapping is something you don't forget how to do, even if you're functionally retarded after a such a long time away.
